{"step_by_step_thinking": "To determine which antihypertensive is not safe in pregnancy, we need to review the information provided in the relevant documents. Document [3] states that ACE inhibitors and angiotensin receptor blockers should be avoided in pregnancy due to their fetotoxic effects.
